Keep your Microsoft Teams status active and always available with ease! MS Teams: Always Available is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to simulate activity and prevent your status from switching to "Away." Whether you're stepping away briefly or need uninterrupted focus without distractions, this tool ensures your online presence remains consistent.

Features
Auto-Status Maintenance: Automatically simulates activity to keep your status "Available."
Simple to Use: Activate with a single click and let the extension handle the rest.
Local Functionality: Operates entirely on your device without collecting or transmitting any data.
Seamless Integration: Works with both Microsoft Teams (classic) and the new version 2.
Stay connected and always appear presentâ€”no interruptions, no downtime!
